May 20, 2012 D SCABA Entertainment Contest (B Section)
SCABA Entertainment Contest (B Section) 20 Entertainments Contest with Deportment Mark SCABA Entertainment Contest scaba-entertainment-contest-b-section
The Hawth, Crawley, West Sussex Highest Unplaced Youth/3rd Section Band: Berkshire County Youth Highest placed Youth Band: Berkshire County Youth Best Soloist: Andy Hill, Denmead Brass Best Trombone Section: Epsom & Ewell Best Compere Conductor: Robin Langdon, Cobham
